metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare's unified cybersecurity platform secures users, apps, and networks everywhere. See how a connectivity cloud simplifies and streamlines security.

metaImage.description: DO NOT REMOVE, THIS IS CLOUDFLARE'S GLOBAL OG META ASSET

relatedBlades.title: AI disruption, IT sprawl, and regulatory pressures
relatedBlades.copy: AI usage and regulatory demands are increasing, and IT systems are spread out — exposing new vulnerabilities, and making it harder to simplify and scale enterprise security.

columnContent.title: AI-driven attacks
columnContent.description: AI adoption creates new security challenges — with new security exposures and new AI threat vectors.

columnContent.title: Operational overload
columnContent.description: Fragmented IT environments and tool sprawl reduce visibility, overwhelm security teams, and increase risk.

columnContent.title: Compliance pressure
columnContent.description: Rising global regulations and resilience needs make it harder for enterprises to meet data residency and localization standards.

relatedBlades.title: One security platform powered by an intelligent global network
relatedBlades.copy: A single security platform powered by an intelligent global network delivers unmatched visibility, AI-driven threat defense, and built-in compliance controls to protect users, applications, and data anywhere.

columnContent.title: GenAI and application security
columnContent.description: Modern APIs, apps, and GenAI demand secure, real-time communication to prevent data exposure and ensure resilient, high-performance application security.

columnContent.title: Secure access architecture
columnContent.description: AI-driven attacks and remote work environments weaken perimeter security, prompting organizations to adopt Zero Trust for stronger, adaptive defense.

columnContent.title: Network security and performance
columnContent.description: Modernize network security with an AI-driven architecture to reduce costs, mitigate threats, and deliver faster, more reliable performance with localization capabilities.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Speedier incident response times, reduced cost, and faster innovation

statsFeatures.description: improvement in response times to security and performance incidents
reduction in total cost of ownership (TCO) of security and IT investments

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare's single security platform secures enterprise digital ecosystems with scale and simplicity

columnContent.title: Bi-directional network to application layer protection
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's fully integrated AI-powered security solutions — [application security](https://www.cloudflare.com/application-services/solutions/),  [SASE/SSE](https://www.cloudflare.com/zero-trust/)  and  [network security](https://www.cloudflare.com/network-security/) — secure both inbound and outbound traffic — across network, application, and user traffic.

columnContent.title: AI workloads protection — from models to inference
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's AI solutions — [AI Gateway](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/products/ai-gateway/), [Workers AI](https://www.cloudflare.com/developer-platform/products/workers-ai/), and [Firewall for AI](https://blog.cloudflare.com/firewall-for-ai/)  work in conjunction to enhance the security, scalability, and efficiency of AI workloads.

columnContent.title: AI-powered protection
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's multi-vector AI security delivers comprehensive protection, including [unified risk posture](https://www.cloudflare.com/unified-risk-posture-executive-guide/) with real-time detection, adaptive defense, threat services with [Cloudforce One](https://www.cloudflare.com/threat-intelligence/), and automated response across users, apps, APIs, and workloads.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Indeed modernizes IT and security by replacing its VPN with a Zero Trust approach

content.value: Indeed's security team prioritizes ensuring the platform is safe for the hundreds of millions of employers and job seekers who rely on the platform, and protecting sensitive user data from leaks and theft. On top of their day-to-day security concerns, Indeed recognized the need to modernize an IT ecosystem that had grown increasingly complex.

To address these security and modernization goals, Indeed turned to Cloudflare's connectivity cloud for secure any-to-any connectivity. In partnership with Cloudflare, Indeed began transforming its IT ecosystem, reducing complexity, improving security, and modernizing its architecture in the cloud.

Cloudflare sets the standards for all the vendors we work with. By reducing complexity and improving security across the board, Cloudflare is safeguarding the trust of our most important stakeholders — the employers and job seekers at the heart of the Indeed platform."
The employers and job seekers at the heart of the
